item.title: 印尼与美国签署互惠贸易协议，印尼政府部门宣布
item.description: 印度尼西亚经济事务部周五表示，印度尼西亚与美国已签署互惠贸易协议。【原文：Indonesia and the United States have signed an agreement on reciprocal trade, the Indonesian Ministry of Economic Affairs said on Friday.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，英伟达即将完成对OpenAI融资轮的300亿美元投资。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周四援引消息人士报道，英伟达即将敲定对OpenAI的300亿美元投资，该投资将取代去年双方达成的1000亿美元长期承诺，成为这家人工智能初创企业新一轮融资的一部分。【原文：Nvidia is close to finalizing a $30 billion investment into OpenAI that will replace the long-term $100 billion commitment agreed upon by the companies last year, as part of a new funding round for the AI start-up, Financial Times reported on Thursday, citing sources.】

item.title: 日本核心通胀率降至两年低点，日本央行加息时机更难把握
item.description: 日本周五公布的数据显示，该国1月份核心消费者通胀率年率升至2.0%，创下两年来的最低增速。这表明成本推动型通胀压力正在减弱，可能使日本央行关于何时加息的决策变得复杂。【原文：Japan's annual core consumer inflation hit 2.0% in January, marking the slowest pace in two years, data showed on Friday, suggesting weakening cost-push pressure that could complicate the central bank's decision on how soon to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 古兹曼与戈麦斯股价暴跌，美国销量因需求疲软持续萎缩
item.description: 墨西哥快餐连锁品牌Guzman y Gomez周五公布的上半年利润超出预期，但受美国市场销售疲软及消费环境严峻影响，其股价暴跌16%至历史最低点。【原文：Mexican fast-food chain Guzman y Gomez reported a better-than-expected first-half profit on Friday, but sluggish U.S. sales in a challenging consumer environment sent its shares plunging 16% to a record low.】

item.title: 花旗加强私人银行领导层以推进北美业务
item.description: 花旗集团周四宣布，其北美私人银行已任命查德·雷迪担任西部地区市场执行官。【原文：Citigroup's Private Bank North America has appointed Chad Reddy as its market executive for the West, the bank said on Thursday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，汇丰银行裁减美国债务资本市场团队10%人员
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，汇丰银行裁减了其美国债务资本市场团队10%的员工，这是该行去年10月宣布业务重组后持续削减成本的举措。报道援引知情人士消息称。【原文：HSBC cut 10% of its U.S.-based debt capital markets team, continuing to cull costs after announcing a revamp of the business last October, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州起诉赛诺菲，指控其涉嫌"贿赂"医疗服务提供者以增加药品处方量
item.description: 得克萨斯州总检察长肯·帕克斯顿周四起诉赛诺菲公司，指控其涉嫌"贿赂"医疗服务提供者，诱使他们开具该公司药品而非替代药品。【原文：Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton on Thursday sued Sanofi for allegedly "bribing" providers to prescribe its medications over alternatives.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，扎克伯格为削减人工智能支出而压缩成本，Meta多数员工股权奖励将减少5%。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周四报道，Meta公司将大部分员工的年度股票期权分配额削减约5%，其首席执行官马克·扎克伯格正投入数十亿美元用于人工智能建设。【原文：Meta reduced its annual distribution of stock options by about 5% for most of its staff, as chief executive Mark Zuckerberg ploughs billions of dollars into artificial intelligence build out, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 戴利表示美联储政策处于良好状态
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽·戴利周四表示，由于美联储去年降息使劳动力市场状况改善，且随着关税影响逐渐消退，通胀预计将重启下行趋势，当前货币政策已处于应有位置。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly on Thursday said that with the labor market in a better place because of the Fed's rate cuts last year, and with inflation expected to resume its decline as the impact of tariffs rolls off, monetary policy is where it should be.】

item.title: 蓝猫股份股价再度下跌，最新资本回馈计划令部分投资者感到不安
item.description: 私募基金管理公司蓝猫（Blue Owl）周四宣布从小型债务基金撤资的最新策略令投资者感到不安。此前三个月，该公司曾尝试撤资，导致这家管理着3070亿美元资产的公司的股价下跌。【原文：Private capital manager Blue Owl's latest strategy to return capital from a small debt fund spooked investors on Thursday, three months after a previous attempt pushed down the $307 billion firm's shares.】

item.title: GoPro任命内部人士布莱恩·特拉特为首席财务官
item.description: 运动相机制造商GoPro周四宣布任命布莱恩·特拉特为首席财务官，接替布莱恩·麦基的职位，任命将于3月17日生效。【原文：Action camera maker GoPro on Thursday named Brian Tratt as its chief financial officer, taking over the baton from Brian McGee, effective March 17.】

item.title: 交易日华尔街小幅收跌，美伊紧张局势推升油价
item.description: 周四，华尔街股市效仿欧洲同行小幅下跌，因经济数据喜忧参半，加之美国与伊朗之间持续升温的紧张局势，使不确定性——以及原油价格——居高不下。【原文：Wall Street stocks followed the example of their European counterparts by posting modest losses on Thursday as mixed economic data and simmering tensions between the U.S. and Iran kept uncertainties - and crude prices - high.】

item.title: 蓝猫表示不会限制私募债务基金的投资者流动性
item.description: 私募股权公司蓝猫周四表示，不会停止投资者从私募债务基金中提取流动性或获取现金，此前该公司将季度赎回机会改为分红的举措拖累了集团股价。【原文：Private capital firm Blue Owl said on Thursday it was not halting investor liquidity, or access to cash, from a private debt fund, after a move to replace quarterly redemption opportunities with payouts weighed on the group's shares.】

item.title: 纽蒙特第四季度盈利超预期
item.description: 纽蒙特矿业公司周四公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于金价创纪录的上涨。【原文：Newmont beat Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, driven by a record-breaking rally in bullion prices.】

item.title: 摩根大通称特朗普诉讼案错误将戴蒙列为被告
item.description: 摩根大通银行及其首席执行官周四在法庭文件中表示，唐纳德·特朗普总统在针对摩根大通的50亿美元"断银"诉讼中不当将杰米·戴蒙列为被告，此举旨在将案件移交州法院审理。【原文：President Donald Trump improperly included Jamie Dimon as a defendant in his $5 billion debanking lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase as a way to get the case into state court, the bank and its CEO said in a Thursday court filing.】

item.title: Akamai预测年度营收将超预期，得益于云基础设施业务的强劲势头
item.description: Akamai Technologies周四发布的2026年营收预测超出华尔街预期，表明该公司对其云基础设施服务增长将持续加速充满信心。【原文：Akamai Technologies forecast 2026 revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling confidence that growth in its cloud infrastructure services will continue to accelerate.】

item.title: 华盛顿州最高法院裁定，亚马逊因亚硝酸钠引发的自杀事件可被起诉
item.description: 华盛顿州最高法院周四一致裁定，亚马逊公司必须面对受害者家属的诉讼。这些家庭的亲人因食用从该零售商网站第三方卖家处购买的亚硝酸钠后自杀身亡。【原文：The Washington Supreme Court ruled unanimously on Thursday that Amazon.com must face lawsuits by families that lost relatives who died by suicide after consuming sodium nitrite they bought from outside vendors on the retailer's website.】

item.title: Live Nation季度营收超预期，得益于强劲的演唱会需求
item.description: Live Nation Entertainment周四公布的季度营收超出预期，得益于其演唱会持续强劲的需求。【原文：Live Nation Entertainment beat quarterly revenue estimates on Thursday, helped by sustained demand for its concerts.】

item.title: 美国航空业顶级游说人士称，将信用卡利率上限设为10%可能损害行业利益
item.description: 美国主要航空公司贸易团体负责人周四表示，将信用卡利率上限设定为10%的提案可能对航空业造成巨大冲击，导致乘客减少、飞机数量减少。【原文：The head of the trade group representing major U.S. airlines said Thursday a proposal to cap credit-card interest rates at 10% could have massive repercussions for aviation and could lead to fewer passengers and fewer airplanes.】

item.title: 独家：马拉喀什的宫殿：施瓦布如何在爱泼斯坦被捕前数日转移其2770万美元款项
item.description: 美国司法部公布的文件显示，在2019年被捕前10天，身败名裂的金融家杰弗里·爱泼斯坦试图购买摩洛哥一座宫殿期间，查尔斯·施瓦布公司曾代表其向当地房产经纪人汇款约2770万美元，其中一笔转账来自资金不足的账户。【原文：Charles Schwab wired about $27.7 million on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein to a realtor in Morocco as the disgraced financier tried to purchase a palace in the 10 days before his 2019 arrest, including one transfer from an account which lacked sufficient funds, files released by the U.S. Department of Justice show.】

item.title: 墨西哥当局发现秘密隧道，重创黑市燃油交易
item.description: 墨西哥当局本周突袭了一条用于从国有输油管道窃取燃料的隧道，这为外界罕见地揭示了该国长期打击黑市交易的行动——这类交易往往由有组织犯罪集团主导。【原文：Mexican authorities raided a tunnel used to steal fuel from a state-owned pipeline this week, offering a rare glimpse into a long-running battle against a black-market trade often dominated by organized crime.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，美银承诺为私募信贷交易提供250亿美元资金
item.description: 据路透社获得的一份内部备忘录显示，美国银行将向私人信贷交易投入250亿美元。【原文：Bank of America is committing $25 billion to private credit deals, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然上调年度牛奶价格预测，暗示将派发特别股息
item.description: 新西兰乳业巨头恒天然集团周五上调了2025/2026年度的牛奶价格预测区间，并表示计划宣布派发特别股息，该股息将由其中国大陆集团的收益提供支持。【原文：New Zealand dairy giant Fonterra Co-operative Group lifted its milk price forecast range for the 2025/2026 season on Friday, and said it intends to declare a special dividend supported by earnings from its Mainland Group.】

item.title: 金融科技公司Clear Street撤回美国IPO申请
item.description: 华尔街经纪商Clear Street周四宣布，已撤回其在美国上市的注册声明。随着金融股和软件股的看跌情绪加剧，这种情绪现已蔓延至新股市场。【原文：Wall Street broker Clear Street has withdrawn its registration statement for a U.S. listing, the company said on Thursday, as heightened bearish sentiments on financial and software stocks now extend to the new listings market.】

item.title: 尽管农民面临严峻形势，Nutrien仍预计钾肥需求将上升
item.description: 全球最大钾肥生产商纽特瑞恩预计，尽管农民削减磷肥使用量且面临低回报，2026年作物营养需求仍将增长。【原文：Top world potash producer Nutrien expects increased demand for the crop nutrient in 2026 despite farmers cutting back on phosphate fertilizer and facing low returns.】

item.title: 巴西政府考虑放宽航空公司获取公共航空基金的准入条件
item.description: 巴西港口和机场部长西尔维奥·科斯塔·菲略已要求财政部放宽国家民航基金（FNAC）对航空公司贷款的条件。政府文件显示，该公共基金预计将从2026年起释放40亿雷亚尔（约合7.6476亿美元）。【原文：Brazil's Ports and Airports Minister Silvio Costa Filho has asked the Finance Ministry to loosen conditions on loans to airlines backed by the National Civil Aviation Fund (FNAC), a public fund expected to release 4 billion reais ($764.76 million) starting in 2026, government documents show.】

item.title: 彭博社报道，沃尔格林在被私募股权收购后裁减员工
item.description: 据彭博社周四援引公司信函报道，连锁药房沃尔格林在被私募股权公司Sycamore Partners收购后，将在全美范围内裁员逾600人。【原文：Pharmacy chain Walgreens is laying off over 600 employees across the U.S. following its acquisition by private equity firm Sycamore Partners, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing company letters.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，强生公司正考虑以200亿美元出售其骨科业务部门。
item.description: 据彭博社周四报道，知情人士透露，强生公司正筹备出售其计划剥离的骨科业务部门，多家大型私募股权公司已对此虎视眈眈。【原文：Johnson & Johnson is preparing a potential sale of the orthopedics unit that it has been planning to separate, with big buyout firms already circling, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卡车司机工会敦促法官阻止联合包裹服务公司向司机提供15万美元买断方案
item.description: 国际卡车司机兄弟会的律师周四向法官表示，该工会预计，如果这家快递巨头获准实施计划中的裁员计划，将有超过1万名联合包裹服务公司的司机接受15万美元的买断方案。【原文：A lawyer for the International Brotherhood of Teamsters told a judge on Thursday that the union expects over 10,000 United Parcel Service drivers to accept $150,000 buyouts if the delivery giant is allowed to proceed with a planned workforce-cutting program.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，AMD将为3亿美元的Crusoe贷款提供担保。
item.description: 据《信息报》周四援引知情人士消息报道，超微半导体公司（AMD）将为初创企业Crusoe提供3亿美元贷款担保，用于采购其人工智能芯片并在俄亥俄州数据中心部署。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices is set to provide a $300 million loan guarantee for startup Crusoe to buy its AI chips and deploy them in an Ohio data center, the Information reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the deal.】
